hmh.android.ui.actionbar

Class SimpleMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • hmh.android.ui.actionbar.SimpleMenu

  • public class SimpleMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    A really dumb implementation of the android.view.Menu interface, that's only useful for our actionbar-compat purposes. See com.android.internal.view.menu.MenuBuilder in AOSP for a more complete implementation.
